name: Crazy Candy!
description:
This is a game made over the Summer 2021 break. Made by myself(Morrad1991) and TakUser. I did programming, Tak did the graphics. The gameplay is Solo Crazy 8's, with some added tweaks. Read the instructions and have fun.

There are still a few bugs to be sorted out and some polishing, but I do not have time to refine due to school starting. Thanks for reading, enjoy your game.
